auth.comingSoon: Coming in next couple of weeks

hero.title: Tennis scheduling made simple
hero.subtitle: No more back-and-forth texting to arrange tennis games. Set your availability, share your session, and let players book time with you.

howItWorks.title: Easy scheduling for everyone
howItWorks.subtitle: Just like Calendly, but for tennis players

step1.title: 1. Set your availability
step1.description: Choose your preferred courts, times, and game preferences (singles, doubles, skill level)

step2.title: 2. Share your tennis link
step2.description: Send your link to friends or make it discoverable for other players to find

step3.title: 3. Get booked
step3.description: Players select their preferred time slot and request to join your session

step4.title: 4. Play tennis
step4.description: Meet at the court and enjoy your game - no more scheduling hassles

saveTime.title: Save time
saveTime.description: Eliminate the back-and-forth of finding a time that works for everyone

workTogether.title: Work better together
workTogether.description: Connect with players at your skill level for better matches and training

playMore.title: Play more tennis
playMore.description: Spend less time coordinating and more time on the court improving your game

gameTypes.title: Your tennis, your way
gameTypes.subtitle: Set your preferences once and let players book the perfect session with you.
gameTypes.competitive: Competitive matches - Singles games with scoring
gameTypes.training: Training sessions - Practice and skill development

cta.title: Easy ahead
cta.subtitle: We take the work out of connecting for tennis. Your schedule, your link, your way.

form.skillLevelHelper: Choose the NTRP skill level range for your tennis match.
form.gameTooltip: Looking for a person to play a regular tennis match
form.trainingTooltip: Main goal is to improve game skills by playing rallies
form.trainingPlaceholder: Describe your training plan and goals...
form.trainingTip: Consider adding training plan or goals to description
form.calendarIntegrationDesc: Connect your Google Calendar to automatically avoid scheduling conflicts

skillHints.BEGINNER: New to intermediate players learning fundamentals
skillHints.INTERMEDIATE: Consistent players with developed strokes and strategy
skillHints.ADVANCED: Elite players with tournament experience and advanced skills

errors.failedToLoadLocations: Failed to load locations. Please try again later.

errors.selectAtLeastOneTimeSlot: Please select at least one time slot
errors.somePastTimes: Some selected times are in the past
errors.descriptionTooLong: Description must be less than 1000 characters

empty.noEventsCreated: You haven't created any events yet.
empty.noEventsJoined: You haven't joined any events yet.

ntrp.description: The National Tennis Rating Program (NTRP) helps match players of similar skill levels.

levels.1.0: 1.0 - New Player: Just starting to learn tennis
levels.1.5: 1.5 - Beginner: Limited experience, working on getting ball in play
levels.2.0: 2.0 - Novice: Needs court experience, obvious stroke weaknesses
levels.2.5: 2.5 - Advanced Novice: Learning ball judgment, can sustain slow rallies
levels.3.0: 3.0 - Intermediate: Fairly consistent on medium-paced shots
levels.3.5: 3.5 - Advanced Intermediate: Improved stroke dependability with directional control
levels.4.0: 4.0 - Advanced: Dependable strokes with depth and directional control
levels.4.5: 4.5 - Expert: Beginning to master power and spins, sound footwork
levels.5.0: 5.0 - Elite: Good shot anticipation, can structure game around strengths
levels.5.5: 5.5 - Elite+: Developed power/consistency as major weapon

errors.failedToSave: Failed to save profile. Please try again.

publicEvent.notFound: The event you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
publicEvent.noLongerAvailable: Event not found or no longer available

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.warning: This action cannot be undone. All your data including events and join requests will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.modalBody: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data.
